sentences.english: The rapid development of the present vocational colleges calls for the 2nd-level management in schools or departments.
sentences.chinese: 院系二级管理是当前高职院校迅速发展的需要。

sentences.english: Pairs of Private Vocational Colleges dissatisfied with lack of self-affirmation, strong inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 对民办高职院校感到不满，自我肯定不足，自卑感强。

sentences.english: Fostering innovatory capability is the reform target for professional education.
sentences.chinese: 培养学生的能力是高职院校教育改革和发展的目标。

sentences.english: Anti - corruption is a big issue of practice and theory.
sentences.chinese: 实践能力培养是高职教育的重要特色。

sentences.english: Higher vocational education which based on capacity must strengthen the practice teaching.
sentences.chinese: 高职教育是以能力为本的教育，必须强化实践教学。

sentences.english: Training direction of amanuenses major in higher vocational college is applied talents.
sentences.chinese: 高职文秘专业培养应用型人才。

sentences.english: This study provides some implications for English teaching and learning in vocational colleges in our country.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为中国高职院校英语教与学提供了一些启示。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Subjective Well-being of Advanced Vocational College teachers is good on the whole.
sentences.chinese: 结论高职教师的主观幸福感整体上良好。

sentences.english: What can teachers of Chinese do in vocational colleges?
sentences.chinese: 中文教师在工科类高职院校真的无事可做吗？

sentences.english: Case teaching is one of the important ways of teaching practice for economy and management major, especially for higher vocational education.
sentences.chinese: 案例教学是高职经管类专业实践教学的重要方式之一。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhen did grow up to win a very high post in the imperial government, and he lived to be more than ninety years old.
sentences.chinese: 萧振长大后，果然在朝廷身居高职，活到了九十多岁。

sentences.english: Therefore, this paper explores the importance of solfeggio teaching from music emotion and music theory.
sentences.chinese: 视唱练耳教学在高职音乐教育中占有重要的地位。

sentences.english: Theexperiment shows that cognitive style of on-campus students is mainly field dependent.
sentences.chinese: 实验证明，高职学生认知风格以场依存性风格为主。

sentences.english: Five-year high vocational education in medical college starts late.
sentences.chinese: 医学院校的五年制高职起步晚。

sentences.english: Higher vocational education is the important aspect of multi-form running school in undergraduate university.
sentences.chinese: 高职教育是本科院校多种形式办学的一个重要方面。

sentences.english: Industry-university cooperation is the necessary choice for the development of higher vocational education.
sentences.chinese: 产学合作是高职教育改革和发展的必由之路。

definition: vocational secondary school/technical secondary school/trade school/abbr. for 中等專科學校|中等专科学校
vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])
vocational high school (abbr. for 職業高中|职业高中[zhi2 ye4 gao1 zhong1])
vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
adult education, abbr. for 成人教育[cheng2 ren2 jiao4 yu4]
